# `matrixfit` and `new_matrixfit`

We want the same plot output with both plot mechanism.

```{r}
corr <- bootstrap.cf(samplecf)
```

```{r}
old_fit <- matrixfit(corr, 10, 20)
plot(old_fit, do.qqplot = FALSE)
```

```{r}
new_fit <- new_matrixfit(corr, 10, 20)
plot(new_fit, log = 'y')
```
